title: Textile, 1900–30
medium:
Medium: foundation warp and weft: cotton;  pile warp: silk
Technique: printed on supplementary warp pile (velvet)
description: Length of printed velvet with a pattern of curving artichoke forms in rows that alternate direction; inside each artichoke is a curvilinear flower and stem. Printed in silver metallic pigment on a soft, irregular pink ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 1900–30.
1900–30. Medium: foundation warp and weft: cotton;  pile warp: silk
Technique: printed on supplementary warp pile (velvet). Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1938-57-1226-a.
